txt.en: Defeat invaders in the Withered Heath

The Withered Heath is a barren, burned plain that lies between the two eastern arms of the Ered Mithrin, and was once home to many great dragons. Cold-drakes emerged from the Anvil's crack blackening the skies with their wings and the stones with their breath.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest requires Withered Heath: Weathering the Storm to be underway. If that quest has been completed or failed, you will be unable to exit and re-enter this instance in order to complete this quest.</rgb>
Invaders in the Withered Heath have been defeated.
